text: haey puokke ban niyeay towkean sbek robsa puokke tha hetoaveibeanchea puok eng thveusaeaksaei brachheang nung yeung? sbek ban tb tha a l laoh chea anak del thveu aoy avei krobyeang chehniyeay noh haey ban thveu aoy puok yeung chehniyeay . haey trong chea anak del ban bangkeut puok anakchea leukdambaung haey puok anak ka nung trauv vilotralb towkean trong vinh der
